Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Whaaat? I'm so sleepy. I'm going home.


<sp:0:2:2:5000>Aw, Mattison... I wonder if you'll be done with your
errand tomorrow?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry>What now?


I don't want anyone distracting me.
I'm supposed to play with <clr:0000>Mattison<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>But she hasn't come down from her <clr:0000>room
on the second floor<clr:ffff>. Maybe she's busy
studying Gerudo?
It's sooo confusing how many "vo"
and "va" sounds there are in all those
Gerudo words.
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think><clr:0000>Mattison<clr:ffff> said Gerudo don't need very
much sleep.

I guess that's why she<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>can stay up
so late.

But even if I could stay up late, there's
no way I could study as much as
<clr:0000>Mattison<clr:ffff> does.
Talk_0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I wonder if <clr:0000>Mattison<clr:ffff> is still studying in
<clr:0000>her room<clr:ffff>?

She's pretty amazing, huh? I'm way too
sleepy for that.
Talk_0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry>Hey! I told you I'm playing a training
game. So don't bother me.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>I'm supposed to be training with
<clr:0000>Mattison<clr:ffff>, but...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>she said she had to do some kinda
<clr:0000>errand <clr:ffff>today.
Talk_0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Mattison is in this place to the <clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff>
called <clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>.

It's really far away and really hot...but
also really cold!

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>So, I'm gonna eat a bunch and exercise
a lot and get even healthier. That way
I can go and play with her sometime!
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That means hello in Gerudo. Mattison
taught me. Don't ya love how it sounds?
Talk_0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Even if she is living far away, Mattison will
always be my friend.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>She's living in this place to the <clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff>
called <clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>.

I heard it's really far away and really
hot...but also really cold!

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>So, I'm gonna eat a bunch and exercise
a lot and get even healthier. That way
I can go and play with her sometime!
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That means good evening in Gerudo.
Mattison taught me. Isn't it great?
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>Ugh, come on. <sp:5:0:0>Can't you see I'm playing
a game with <clr:0000>Mattison<clr:ffff>?

She says it's special training for dealing
with something called a voe!

<sp:3:0:2:0901>I think these voe things are some kind of
monsters or something. I guess I better
watch out for 'em too!
Talk_0036:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>I wonder if <clr:0000>Mattison<clr:ffff> will be done with her
errand tomorrow?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1001: <sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>Gah! Sorry! I'm at the wrong house!
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I wonder what greeting I should use
when it's raining? Hmm,<sp:5:0:0> maybe rain'otta<sp:5:0:0>
or something?
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Hey...<sp:5:1:0>this is my house!


<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>Ugh, why are you so bad with
directions?!<sp:5:0:0> You went to the wrong
house again, mister!
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That means good morning in Gerudo.
Mattison taught me. Sounds neat, huh?
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry>Hey, I told you not to pester me!<sp:0:4:0>I'm pretending to be one of those voe
monster things. If you interrupt, I can't
help <clr:0000>Mattison<clr:ffff> do her special training!
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Uh, hold on.<sp:5:1:0> This is MY house!


<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>Hmph! <sp:5:0:0>Why don't you know where
you live?
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>What d'ya want?


I'm going to play with <clr:0000>Mattison<clr:ffff> now,
so don't bug me, OK?

She's <clr:0000>moving<clr:ffff> reeeally soon, so we gotta
play a whole bunch while we can!
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Sad>What d'ya want now?


<clr:0000>Mattison is moving<clr:ffff> really soon, so I've
gotta play with her. A lot. I mean it.

So, don't bother me!
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I sure hope it stops raining soon.
I was playing this fun training game
with <clr:0000>Mattison<clr:ffff>.
But we can't practice outsmarting voe
when it's like this.
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>When is this rain ever gonna stop? I can't
wait to play that training game with
<clr:0000>Mattison <clr:ffff>again.

Talk_0009:

Talk_0010:

Talk_0029:

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>So, I'm gonna eat a bunch and exercise
